original_title: 甘酢っぱい部活動の思い出 - 羽田真里
overview: About 20 years passed, I still can not forget Mari Haneda, the manager of the school soccer team. This is a love story happened 20 years ago. I was injured, and could not take care of myself. My parents were in the vacation, and I had to stay home alone for few days. Mari came to my home, and cooked for me. While I was nervous and waiting for the food, she smirked like a little devil, rolled up her skirt and seduced me to touch her. What a sentimental and sweet memory!
title: Sentimental and Sweet Memory in the Student Life
